DOC.detailed_description: This research prospective cross-section study patient undergo elective CA . Research design allow study anxiety four timepoints correlation CA outcome psychological parameter . This study conduct Coronary care unit department Cardiology , General Teaching Hospital Celje , Slovenia . Data regard prior CA , hospital stay discharge variable collect order control confound variable test association anxiety psychological parameter . All data need study collect within one month patient enrollment study four occasion : ( 1 ) 14 day prior CA - patient receive questionnaire post , ( 2 ) day admission , 2-4 hour CA , ( 3 ) 24 hour CA , prior discharge ( 4 ) 4-6 week discharge . A month CA , questionnaires anxiety depressive symptom send participant address reply pay envelope provide . The Republic Slovenia National Medical Ethics Committee approve study .
DOC.criteria: invite elective CA suspected/unknown : coronary artery disease , valvular heart disease , heart failure etiology , unexplained arrhythmia , cardiomyopathy etiology ; write consent ; complete first set questionnaire 14 day prior coronary angiography need urgent coronary angiography , coronary angiography last 6 month , unable provide write consent , severe physical and/or mental disease/disability , help need completing questionnaire , unsigned consent form , incomplete first set questionnaire 14 day prior coronary angiography .
